I found the solution for the controls if you are using vista. The two things in the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. call of pripyat folder must go to a different directory. You must place shaders_cache and user into C:\Users\Public\Documents\s.t.a.l.k.e.r. - call of pripyat. I am running vista 64 and this was my idea.

hmm jsut found out that its a contiguous RAM problem after trying to extract "CallOfPripyat.arc" with a program called "FreeArc". i recieve the error Can't allocate memory required for (de)compression in rep:1gb, anyone else who gets this error will have to free RAM MEMORY(anti virus.. etc), and it has to be contiguous (ie. in one block).

@matijapkc @jkarthik2k1
PROBLEM SOLVED
Downlaod "Freearc"
EXTRACT CallOfPripyat.arc with freearc
If that doesn't work, click on "Detach" instead
if that doesn't work try freeing up RAM, by uninstalling some AV temporarily Have Fun! 
Thankyou globeplus! good upload!

CREDITS TO "sadfad" FOR FINDING THIS!\
FOR ANYONE WITH NO CONTROLS FOLLOW THIS
You must place shaders_cache and user.ltx into "C:\Users\Public\Documents\s.t.a.l.k.e.r. - call of pripyat". HAVE PHUN! Good upload!
and that applies to XP users too(me)
